template.template: Template App IBM DB2 LUW Database
template.name: Template App IBM DB2 LUW Database
template.description: Template for IBM DB2 LUW database monitoring end-point It used for monitoring from Management host with installed Zabbix agent Instance details has to be updated in MACROS section

item.name: Date of the last successful database backup
Hours since the last successful database backup
Date of the last successful log backup
Hours since the last successful log backup

trigger_prototype.name: Connect status of HADR host {#HADR_HOST} is invalid ({ITEM.VALUE})
State of HADR host {#HADR_HOST} is invalid ({ITEM.VALUE})

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template App IBM DB2 LUW Database:zbxdb2[get_tbs_state,{#TABLESPACE_NAME}].str(NORMAL)}=0 and {Template App IBM DB2 LUW Database:zbxdb2[get_tbs_state,{#TABLESPACE_NAME}].str(BACKUP_IN_PROGRESS)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: Tablespace {#TABLESPACE_NAME} is in an invalid state {ITEM.VALUE}
Used more than {$TBS_HIGH} % of available space for {#TABLESPACE_NAME} tablespace

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template App IBM DB2 LUW Database:zbxdb2[get_tbs_used_space_pct,{#TABLESPACE_NAME}].last()}>{$TBS_WARNING} and {Template App IBM DB2 LUW Database:zbxdb2[get_tbs_used_space_pct,{#TABLESPACE_NAME}].last()}<={$TBS_HIGH}
trigger_prototype.name: Used more than {$TBS_WARNING} % of available space for {#TABLESPACE_NAME} tablespace

trigger.name: Amount of processes exceeded threshold {$PROCESSES_HIGH} %
trigger.description: Amount of current processes exceeded threshold

trigger.name: No database backups for more than {$HOURS_SINCE_LAST_DB_BACKUP} hours
No log backups for more than {$HOURS_SINCE_LAST_DB_BACKUP} hours
